ComicInfo.Summary:
With their training complete the Hellions are set to take down their first New God. Their target; the Vampire God known as Night. But what looks like an easy mission that can't fail quickly falls apart and the team finds themselves in fight for their lives. A fight that not all of them will survive.

Garisa & Neeraj Menon | 3 | D | Cover D | Ian Richardson & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 |
